#### Split, Join  

array  string string  array     ..  .
array  string     split     .

```js
const arr = ['first', 'second', 'third'];

arr.toString().split(',').join(' '); // first second third
```

#### Splice 

    splice(start, deleteCount) .        ..
    ,        .
 ,     .

```js
let count = 0;

arr.forEach((v) => {
  const start = v - count;

  arr.splice(start, 1);
  count++;
});
```

#### Set 

iterator            .
Set           .

```js
const foo = [1, 2, 3, 5, 1, 1, 2, 3, 5]

console.log(new Set(foo)) // {1, 2, 3, 5}

//    (remove duplication)
[...new Set([...array1 ,...array2])];
```

####   this   ?
this    ,   call, apply, bind . 
 
[mygumi][mygumi] [zerocho][zerocho]   . 
call, apply    ,        .
call     ,   this  . 
apply  ,    . 
bind  this    .        . 
      .


``` js
function Person() { 
    this.name = this.name || "default"; this.authority = "guest";
    return this.name + " is " + this.authority; 
}

// call     .
Person.call({name: "bill"}); // "bill is guest"

// 1. bind  this .
const userInfo = Person.bind({name: "test"});  // undefined
// 2.  .
userInfo(); // "test is guest"

// call     .
const userInfo3 = Person.call({name: "test3"});  // undefined
userInfo3; // "test3 is guest"
```

####   ?
          . 
             .
 bind    , call         .   

```js
function funcA(value1, value2) {
  console.log(`value: ${value1} ${value2}`)
}

funcB = () => funcA.call(this, 2, 3) 
funcB() // value: 2 3
```


gitignore      ,   stage     .

**Git Ignore**

```html

git add . 
git commit -m 'ignore '
```

**Git Rebase**

```html
git rebase -i HEAD~2 // (   )    pick -> s //
pick  squash (s)   :wq
```

**Git Delete**

```html
git branch -d feature/dev-1 git push origin -d feature/dev-1
```

**Git Conflict**

```html
// 1. IDE     Webstorm : VCS > Git > Resolve Confilicts
Terminal: git merge --continue :qa // 2.    // HEAD ~ === 
 ,  commit . git add . git commit -m 'confilct
resolved'
```

![post-2019-08-08-2](/img/post-2019-08-08-2.png){: width="100%" height="100%"}

**Git Cherry Pick**

```html

```

**Git Merge**

```html
git checkout A git merge B (Fast-forward :   .) git merge
--no-ff B ( merge  ) //    . git
status // git merge  <<<<<< HEAD #  checkout  A  
///// #  >>>>>> B #   B mereg conflic   add, commit
  merge commit .
```

**Git Merge **

```html
git merge --abort
```

**Git Reset**
  push    . (  ,    )

```html
git reset --hard HEAD^
```

**Git Revert**

```html
git revert < >
```

```html
--global user.name git config --global user.email
```

**Git  **

```html
npm audit fix
```

object  string    `JSON.stringify()` .

```js
const obj = [{ name: 'first' }, { name: 'second' }, { name: 'third' }];

JSON.stringify(obj); // "[{"name":"first"},{"name":"second"},{"name":"third"}]
```

              .

```js
const obj = [
  { name: 'first', value: 1 },
  { name: 'second', value: 2 },
  { name: 'third', value: 3 },
  { name: 'third', value: 4 },
  { name: 'third', value: 5 },
];

const result = new Set(obj.map((v) => v.name));
console.log(result); // {"first", "second", "third"}
```

 Store as Global Variable   temp1   
`copy(temp1)`     .

Post.title: ES6
Post._content:
![image](/images/thumnail/es6.png)

#### 1.import/export

     `export default `   .
      ,
          .

  Util     ,  .

`export default {}`  .  `import  from `  
`.`      .
           .

#### 2. spread

Spread   Object      .
     merge   ,
 Object     merge    .
       .

: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/47103028/how-to-use-object-spread-with-nested-properties

```js
const source = { a: 2, b: 3, c: { d: 2, d2: 1 } };
const target = {
  c: { d: 4 },
};

const result = { ...source, ...target };
console.log(result); // {a:2, b:3, c: {d:4}}

const result2 = { ...source, ...target, c: { ...source.c, ...target.c } };
console.log(result2); // {a: 2, b: 3, c: {d: 4, d2: 1}}
```
#### , 

ES6  Spread            .

### Mac  / Window 

`cmd` + `d` / `ctrl` + `d` :    
`option + cmd + i` / `F12` :  
`ctrl + space` :   
`cmd` + `shift` + `p` :   

>  json  
> `>` open settings (json)

```
// settings.json
{
  // set prettier
  "editor.formatOnSave": true,
  "[javascript]": {
    "editor.formatOnSave": true
  },
  "editor.codeActionsOnSave": {
    // For ESLint
    "source.fixAll.eslint": false
  },
  "files.autoSave": "onFocusChange",
  "editor.fontSize": 13,

  // set eslint
  "eslint.alwaysShowStatus": true,
  "eslint.workingDirectories": [{ "mode": "auto" }],
  "eslint.validate": ["javascript", "typescript"]
}
```
